name: One Click Man (threebgames)
description:
One Click Man - Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2019

Some graphics directly from or altered from  @estudiovacaroxa

Solo Game Project Submission

Uploaded both Windows exe downloadable and HTML5 Version

For Jam Purposes please use the Windows version as the HTML5 version was unable to be tested and may not even load due to itch.io outage from the ludicrous ammount of submissions near deadline time (*insert on fire it's fine meme*).

My first fully public indie work! <24 hours (Late start but still finished something hurrah)
